title: Geraldo & His Orchestra - I Bring To You Sweet Music 1933-48
description:
"Whether your taste lies in the nostalgic ballad from a great concert orchestra with lashings of strings and harp, the exotic appeal of folk music from Brazil to the West Indies with the fascinating swish of maraccas and incessant click of the claves, Jazz in its various vintages of Chicago, New Orleans and Dixieland, or with a dash of ultra-modernity in the form of Bop, then you may request any or all of these musical forms from the most versitale band leader of all time - GERALDO."

****************************************************************

Vocalists: Eve Becke, Al Bowlly, Len Camber, Dorothy Carless, Carole Carr, Cyril Crantham, Archie Lewis, Cavan O'Connor, Birrell O' Malley, Monte Rey

Musicians include: Billy Amstell, Sid Bright, Clinton ffrench, Harry Gold, Max Golberg, Harry Hayes, Ted Heath, Jiver Hutchinson, Ivor Mairants, Alfie Noakes, Nat Temple
